communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

BWC FOR 
Full Name: Jordan Raymond Mercarter
Date: 01/24/2024
Birthdate: 10/28/2000

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

mohamed abouelnaga

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on October 30, 2024

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on October 30, 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: October 30, 2024
Location: Fannin County, Georgia
Suspect: Brittany Patterson, 41
Incident Summary: Patterson was arrested at her home and charged with reckless endangerment after her 10-year-old son walked less than a mile into town alone. Bodycam footage captures officers informing Patterson of her arrest at her doorstep, placing her in handcuffs, and escorting her to a police vehicle.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the call regarding Patterson’s son.
Transported the child home.
Arrested Patterson at her residence.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun
